content: जड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जलति घनीभवति जल् अच् लस्य डः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Cold, frigid, chilly; <ls>Māl. 9. 13</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Dull, paralysed, motionless, benumbed; चिंताजडं दर्शनं <ls>Ś. 4. 5</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 41</ls>; <ls n="U.">6. 28</ls>; <ls n="U.">6. 39</ls>; परामृशन् हर्षजडेन पाणिना <ls>R. 3. 68</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 42.</ls> {@--3@} Dull, senseless, stupid, irrational, dull-witted; जडानंधान् पंगून्…त्रातुं <ls>G. L. 15</ls>, so जडधी, जडमति &c. <ls>Y. 2. 25</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 110.</ls> {@--4@} Dulled, made senseless or apathetic, devoid of appreciation or taste; वेदाभ्यासजडः कथं नु विषयव्यावृत्तकौतूहलः <ls>V. 1. 9.</ls> {@--5@} Stunning, benumbing, stupefying. {@--6@} Dumb. {@--7@} Unable to learn the Vedas (Dayabhāga). --डः {@--1@} Cold, frost, winter. {@--2@} Idiocy, stupidity. {@--3@} Dulness, apathy, sluggishness. --डं {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} Lead.
